title: Ward skin not showing up in champion select
body: I purchased some of the new chests and got a Banner of the Horse Ward skin that i payed essence for to solidify. But when i am in champion select, and i go to change my ward skin that specific ward skin doesn't show up. It is inside of my accounts "Purchase History" but not on the actual account itself. I have photos of my purchase history and outlined the ward skin, but prefer not to link any pictures of my account to public forums. Is this a bug or is this intended for some strange reason? Thanks!

replies.body:
We're aware of some issues that prevent certain wards from showing up on both profile collections and in champ select. This is purely a visual issue, as the ward still exists on your account, you just can't see it. We're looking into a fix, but I don't have a timeline on when you'll see that roll out.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
Same with me ! i get a ward from chest when i make to permanent and it doesnt show! and i get rising dawn ward!
